author: hangleang.eth
content: just start a local devnet with 1 supernode, 1 fullnode each clients, leave it ran for a while (~1hr) seems stable with 100% rate.

author: hangleang.eth
content: Prysm still got downscored and disconnected from Lighthouse and Grandine due to the reason <@466006586477772831> mentioned

author: hangleang.eth
content:
the config file:

```
participants:
  # Super nodes
  # -----------
  - cl_type: lighthouse
    cl_image: ethpandaops/lighthouse:peerdas-devnet-4
    cl_max_mem: 4096
    cl_extra_params:
      - --subscribe-all-data-column-subnets
      - --subscribe-all-subnets
  - cl_type: prysm
    cl_image: ethpandaops/prysm-beacon-chain:peerDAS
    cl_max_mem: 4096
    cl_extra_params:
      - --minimum-peers-per-subnet=1
      - --subscribe-all-subnets
      - --log-format=json
  - cl_type: teku
    cl_image: ethpandaops/teku:das
    cl_max_mem: 4096
    cl_extra_params:
      - --p2p-subscribe-all-custody-subnets-enabled
  - cl_type: grandine
    cl_image: ethpandaops/grandine:peerdas-fulu
    cl_max_mem: 4096
    cl_extra_params:
      - --subscribe-all-subnets

  # Full nodes
  # -----------
  - cl_type: lighthouse
    cl_image: ethpandaops/lighthouse:peerdas-devnet-4
    cl_max_mem: 4096
  - cl_type: prysm
    cl_image: ethpandaops/prysm-beacon-chain:peerDAS
    cl_max_mem: 4096
    cl_extra_params:
      - --minimum-peers-per-subnet=1
      - --log-format=json
  - cl_type: teku
    cl_image: ethpandaops/teku:das
    cl_max_mem: 4096
  - cl_type: grandine
    cl_image: ethpandaops/grandine:peerdas-fulu
    cl_max_mem: 4096

network_params:
  electra_fork_epoch: 1
  fulu_fork_epoch: 2
global_log_level: debug
snooper_enabled: true
additional_services:
  - dora
  - spamoor_blob
```

author: parithosh
content:
This change was merged into the ethereum-package main branch btw: https://github.com/ethpandaops/ethereum-package/pull/880

so now when you use kurtosis run github.com/ethpandaops/ethereum-package, the resultant file will contain these updated values

author: manunlp
content:
I ran all scenarios for Prysm x LH and Prysm x Teku.
Seems promising!
